mapper.insert:
insert into collection_case (id, `index`, collection_id, case_id) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.index}, #{item.collectionId}, #{item.caseId})
mapper.select: select cc.id, cc.index, cc.case_id, cc.collection_id, c.name as caseName, c.type as caseType, cm.name as caseModule from collection_case cc left join `case` c on c.id = cc.case_id left join `case_module` cm on cm.id = c.module_id where cc.collection_id = #{collectionId} order by cc.index
select count(*) from collection_case where collection_id = #{collectionId}
select distinct(c.system) from collection_case cc left join `case` c on c.id = cc.case_id where cc.collection_id = #{collectionId}
